column1: "content": "What are some personalized gift ideas for my spouse based on their preferences?"
"content": "---\n\nSome ideas for personalized gifts for your husband
column2:
considering his interest in basketball and the upcoming anniversary:

- Customized basketball gear: Have a jersey or pair of sneakers customized with his name and a special anniversary message.

- Sports-themed wall art: Commission a digital artist to create a unique piece incorporating his favorite basketball elements and a thoughtful anniversary message.

- Basketball ticket stub display: Create a shadowbox frame with tickets from games you've attended together
column3: or surprise him with a ticket to a special game and make a tradition of attending an annual game together.\n\n- Personalized sports-related board game or trivia game
column5: a fun activity for game nights.\n\nGo the extra mile by adding a thoughtful card or note
column6: perhaps with a loving message related to your shared love and basketball adventures. These ideas should definitely score you some points!"
